pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 6, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Toronto, John Tory.

Mayor’s Office
Toronto City Hall
100 Queen Street West

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m. and register in the lobby in front of the elevator bank

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the organizers and artists of the Peeks

Toronto Caribbean Carnival.
Toronto City Hall
100 Queen Street West

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m. and register in the lobby in front of the elevator bank

Calgary, Alberta

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Amarjeet Sohi, Albertan Minister of Transportation Brian Mason, and Calgary Mayor Naheed Nenshi, will make an infrastructure announcement. A media availability will follow.

Calgary International Airport
2000 Airport Road North East

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 3:00 p.m.
    • Media should take the main Airport Trail entrance into YYC Calgary International Airport and park in the Long-Term Parkade 2 (P2) on Level 7. The height restriction to get into the parkade is 7.5 feet (2.3 meters).

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Calgary Stampede President’s Reception.

Closed to media

Media appearances

8:10 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Radio One, Metro Morning with Matt Galloway.
9:50 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CP24 with Stephanie Smyth.
